item.description:
Most of us are familar with Pictionary where we draw things for others to guess.  Creationary is a game where you use Legos to build things for others to guess.  We'll play these games tonight along with any other game where you have to guess stuff by watching people make fools of themselves. ;-)

I'm also trying a new time by having a mini-meetup in the evening.  

 

----------------------------

This is a Mini-Meetup. Please be respectful of others who may want to RSVP and allow new or previously inactive members get a slot if they want.  Thanks. See this discussion for more details.

----------------------------

 

Food theme: 

The theme for this event will be "colorful". Please bring a food item to share with the group that is "colorful".  Interpret that however you want. I will try to have also generic, healthy snacks on hand for all diets.

 

About the location: 
This event will be hosted at a private residence, convieniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises.
item.why: we like drawing and using primitive instruments to communicate in silly ways

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Pictionary/Creationary
